name: Musketfish
description:
What is Musketfish?

Musketfish is a fun platformer-combat game about Freddy the Fish, a one-eyed Salmon, using a musket to fight sharks and crabs, dodge traps and spikes, collect food and defeat the shark king to retake his home. It includes 20 levels full of parkour, platforming, combat, action and 1 unique boss battle!

How do I play?

Use the arrow keys to move and jump. Tap X to fire your musket in the direction you are facing. To beat a level, you must first find the fish food container, and then make your way to the portal. If you get stuck, press R to restart the level. To kill the lead shark, lead them into the bombs that spawn around the level!

What are some fun features?
  • Simple, fun platforming mechanics!
  • Tough parkour!
  • Simple combat system!
  • Awesome pixel graphics!
  • Slow-paced soundtrack and funny sounds!
  • Unique level design!
